Now you know everything!!!! 
 
 The liquid inside young coconuts can be used as a substitute for 
 blood* plasma. 
 
 No piece of paper can be folded in half more than seven (7) times. 
 
 Donkeys kill more people annually than plane crashes. 
 
 You burn more calories sleeping than you do 
 
 watching television. 
 
 Oak trees do not produce acorns until they are fifty (50) years of age or older. 
 
 The first product to have a bar code was Wrigley's gum. 
 
 The king of hearts is the only king without a mustache. 
 
 American Airlines saved $40,000 in 1987 by 
 eliminating one (1) olive from each salad served in first-class. 
 
 Venus is the only planet that rotates clockwise. 
 
 Apples, not caffeine, are more efficient at waking 
 you up in the morning. 
 
 Most dust particles in your house are made from dead skin. 
 (No wonder my house is so DUSTY!* LOL!) 
 
 The first owner of the Marlboro Company died of lung cancer. 
 So did the* first "MarlboroMan." 
 
 Walt Disney was afraid of mice. 
 
 Pearls melt in vinegar. 
 
 The three most valuable brand names on earth:* Marlboro, 
 Coca Cola, and Budweiser, in that order. 
 
 It is possible to lead a cow upstairs...but not downstairs. 
 
 A duck's quack doesn't echo, and no one knows why. 
 
 Dentists have recommended that a toothbrush be kept at least six (6) feet 
 away from a toilet to avoid airborne particles resulting from the 
 flush. (I keep my toothbrush in the living room now!) 
 
 Richard Millhouse Nixon was the first U.S. president whose name contains all* the letters from the word "criminal."* The second? 
 William Jefferson Clinton. 
 
 (Please don't tell me you're SURPRISED!?!!) 
 
 And the best for last..... 
 
 Turtles can breathe through their butts.* 
 (I know some people like that; don't YOU?) 
 
 Now you know everything there is to know.

post_info.post_title: Can you prove any of these wrong?

A duck's quack doesn't echo, and no one knows why. 
 
Dentists have recommended that a toothbrush be kept at least six (6) feet

Yeah they coverd that I saw those episodes

 It means there's poop in the kitchen. Yuck!
that would depend on your cooking ability emoticon_xgood

The liquid inside young coconuts can be used as a substitute for 
 blood* plasma.

 
 True. 
 
 
No piece of paper can be folded in half more than seven (7) times.

 
 False. It becomes difficult, but not impossible. There is a theory that a sheet (of anything) cannot be folded more that NINE times. 
 
 
Donkeys kill more people annually than plane crashes.

 
 False. There's actually no data to support that claim. While there is plenty of data on airplane crashes, there is no data on "donkey deaths." Now, if you were to say more people were INJURED by donkeys, that's probably true.
 
 
 
You burn more calories sleeping than you do 
 watching television. 

 
 False. According to the AHA, a 150-pound person burns 71 calories watching tv for an hour, and 64 calories sleeping for an hour. Even at eight hours, sleeping burns fewer calories. 
 
 
Oak trees do not produce acorns until they are fifty (50) years of age or older.

 
 False*. While IN GENERAL, white oak trees normally don't produce acorns until they're fifty years of age, if they have good location they'll produce at 20 years. Red oaks produce at 10-25 years.
 
 
The first product to have a bar code was Wrigley's gum. 

 
 False. It was the first product to be SCANNED, but not the first to have a barcode.
 
 
The king of hearts is the only king without a mustache.

 
 Sort of. He orignally DID have a moustache. 
 
 
American Airlines saved $40,000 in 1987 by 
 eliminating one (1) olive from each salad served in first-class. 

 
 True. 
 
 
Venus is the only planet that rotates clockwise. 

 
 Sort of. Venus has a retrograde rotation, but there is a possibility that Uranus (no jokes, please) does too.
 
 
Apples, not caffeine, are more efficient at waking 
 you up in the morning. 

 
 True.
 
 
Most dust particles in your house are made from dead skin. 

 
 False. It's a whole bunch of ****.
 
 
The first owner of the Marlboro Company died of lung cancer. 
 So did the* first "MarlboroMan." 

 
 Not really. There is no "Marlboro Company." You're thinking of Phillip Morris Co. No one really knows what caused the first owner's death (in 1873). Two actors who played the "MM" died of lung cancer, but neither was the first.
 
 
Walt Disney was afraid of mice. 

 
 True.
 
 
Pearls melt in vinegar. 

 
 True.* They actually don't melt, they dissolve. It's a chemical process, not a heat process.
 
 
The three most valuable brand names on earth:* Marlboro, 
 Coca Cola, and Budweiser, in that order. 

 
 False. #1 Coca-Cola ($72.5 billion); #2 Microsoft ($70.2 billion); #3 IBM ($53.2 billion)
 
 
 
It is possible to lead a cow upstairs...but not downstairs. 

 
 True.
 
 
A duck's quack doesn't echo, and no one knows why. 

 
 False. A duck's quack causes "destructive interference", which essentially means that what you're hearing is both the original sound AND the echo at the same time.
 
 
Dentists have recommended that a toothbrush be kept at least six (6) feet 
 away from a toilet to avoid airborne particles resulting from the 
 flush. (I keep my toothbrush in the living room now!) 

 
 Sort of. They do recommend it, but they're reasoning if flawed.
 
 
Richard Millhouse Nixon was the first U.S. president whose name contains all* the letters from the word "criminal."* The second? 
 William Jefferson Clinton. 

 
 EDITED: True. So can Abraham Lincoln if you reuse the "i".
 
 
Turtles can breathe through their butts.

 
 Over simplified, but true.

False. So far, ONLY William Jefferson Clinton has sufficient letters to spell "CRIMINAL." Do the math.
 
 
 
 

 
 Despite the fact "Milhous" IS misspelled, I can see all the letters of CRIMINAL in his name.
 
 RICHARD MILHOUS NIXON
Whoops! My bad! You're right. I fixed it. Thanks!

When you are done with a bar of soap in the bathroom, do you rinse IT off? Did you rinse it off BEFORE you soaped up your hands with it? What about that cloth towel you dried your hands with.........were you the first, was the towel already wet?
 
 When in a public restroom/bathroom, door handles/knobs, pushplates etc., can retain germs from unwashed hands. The handles on paper towel despensers, the handles on the water taps. NEVER use a strange bar of soap in a public john.

One day a cannibal visited the neighboring island of cannibals. There, people cost $2 but politicians cost $25. The visiting cannibal asked, "How come politicians cost so much?" The chief answered, "Do you know how hard it is to clean one of those?"

 That was cruel, real cruel to say that about our political associates.
 So, tell the truth:
 A cannibal entered the meat market to buy something nice for dinner. The owner greeted him and told him to look around. The cannibal began to inspect the meat case and noticed the market specialized in brain. 
 Upon further inspection he noticed a marked disparity between the costs of brain meats. A carpenter\'s brain sells for $1.50 per pound. A plumber\'s brain sells for $2.25 per pound. He noticed with alarm that a politician\'s brain sells for $375.00 a pound. With not a little curiosity he asked the owner why the huge difference in price between the similar meats. 
 The owner responded with a deadpan look on his face, "Do you realize how many politicians it takes to get a pound of brains?"
